website_summaries.verdict: The Adrenaline GTS 20 received diverse reviews from consumers. The modern, streamlined design of this road running shoe was appreciated by many runners. Although a few users were disappointed about the shoe’s narrow heel section and limited color variations, others still recommended the shoe for its overall performance. The shoe is perfect for runners who are looking for a blend of flexibility, comfort, and support.
pros: Many consumers said that the Brooks Adrenaline GTS 20 is comfortable
The shoe offers a stable ride, said a few testers
Numerous runners love its updated, stylish design
A lot of reviewers mentioned that it is more cushioned compared to its predecessor
Several users mentioned that the shoe is perfect for long runs
Adrenaline GTS 20 offers a snug fit, based on some reviews
It offers excellent arch support that helps prevent pain, stated a buyer
A couple of purchasers love the spacious feel in the toe box
Adrenaline GTS 20 is a solid yet lightweight running shoe, a user claimed
cons: A few wearers complained about the Adrenaline GTS 20’s narrow heel area
One commenter expressed that the tongue is unusually long
The shoe has limited color variations, according to some consumers

customer_reviews.title: Amazon sent wrong size, twice. Use Start Fitness website instead!!
customer_reviews.text: These shoes are amazing, I’m onto my third or fourth pair and I love them. Great amount of cushioning, and great support for those of us who need it. Disappointed that Amazon sent the wrong size to me tho, I sent the shoes back and asked for the size I ordered to be sent to me (size 11) and yet again the replacements were the wrong size (10.5). Would highly recommend these shoes, and Start Fitness have been reliable every time I’ve gone there, also better on pricing (no affiliation, just happy customer of theirs). I only came to Amazon for colour range but won’t buy these on here again.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Ian

customer_reviews.title: Very poorly made sole. But comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I bought these shoes for over £100 in June 2020. I have worn these when just out and about with light walking but not running or carrying out any intensive exercise (the reason is that I injured my Achilles’ tendon so has been very light walking). It is now 9th September and I’ve just noticed the start of a split of the soul - please see photos. I am amazed at this particularly for the expense of the shoe. I don’t think the shoe is up to standard and wonder if I’ve been given a sub standard pair. However, there seems no means of returning them :-(
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great product, great service, love 'em!
customer_reviews.text: I never really know whether these reviews are genuine so I thought I would do one Item was delivered quickly, opted for 1st Class not premium or prime service and they came the next day! Ordered trainers half a size larger than normal shoes as advised by professional runners and fit perfectly with decent running socks. Ran about 40 miles in first week and so far, they are brilliant. No aches, pains and very comfortable and supportive. Had some GTS 18s and happy to say GTS 20s are the improvement Brooks claim and continue to lead the way.
customer_reviews.author: Nick B.

customer_reviews.title: best running shoes i've owned
customer_reviews.text: i have flat feet. I have tried a number of different make running shoes. these are by far the best that i've had. the support and cushioning are just right. no over pronation and no sore ankles after running. brilliant.
customer_reviews.author: James Beer

customer_reviews.title: Damaged after 3rd wear
customer_reviews.text: Quite dissappointed. The shoe was damaged just after my 3rd wear. I expected a 100£ shoe to last me much longer than 3 wears. The comfort is good enough but I do not think the materials quality is upto the mark. You might be better off buying ASICS or other stability brands.
customer_reviews.author: NIDHIN

customer_reviews.title: Great running shoe for 5-10k. Maybe more. Great for roads or some light off-road.
customer_reviews.text: I have used many Brooks shoes so am familiar with sizing. I am usually 9.5 UK for all shoes and for Brooks, that’s the size I order. I find them a comfortable shoe with no problems.
customer_reviews.author: Omega Craig

customer_reviews.title: If you're a spring chicken with no knee issues then sure..
customer_reviews.text: The shoes is fine. But it wasn't for me. I wanted a modest stability shoe as I probate a little bit and it does ok for this. But the sole is way way to firm, I have Asics gt 8000 which I find to from and the Brooks were even firmer. So it wasn't going to work. I need a stable shoe to support the arc but it needs plenty of cushion otherwise the knees take a beating. I'm 36. I will try Hoke because they have a big stack height or Nike vapor
customer_reviews.author: Justin C.

customer_reviews.title: The Tesla of Running Shoes
customer_reviews.text: These are the most technologically advanced support shoes on the market. Rightly described as the Tesla of running shoes for anyone with a pronation or mild injury. Nothing else has so much clever support and is made as well. These wil last for ages.
customer_reviews.author: Mr Clive Goodman

customer_reviews.title: They are not True Size and shocking delivery
customer_reviews.text: Great trainer. however, you need to order a half or full size bigger than your normal size. I needed to upsize by a full size. The delivery was shocking, I was given a delivery date which is longer that a prime subscriber expects, I was then told it was out for delivery and then they run out of time so re-scheduled and I'm a prime subscriber - seriously concerned about consumer service over returns as well.
customer_reviews.author: S Oliver

customer_reviews.title: An excellent running shoe for super pronators.
customer_reviews.text: I was looking for a running shoe to replace my retired new balance 860s. They proved to be a great shoe. Well cushioned and very supportive for predators, yet still very light. I love them
customer_reviews.author: docpaul

customer_reviews.title: Show is not durable
customer_reviews.text: 4 months in and they are for the bin. Its the first time I have bought expensive trainers, usually I buy a pair every 18-24 months but these have worn out in just 4 months with 2 significant rips on them
customer_reviews.author: Wesley D.

customer_reviews.title: Nice comfortable trainer
customer_reviews.text: Bought the gost 12 last week and these are more comfotable for me just getting over morton nuroma so i recommend these
customer_reviews.author: Barry Baxter

customer_reviews.title: Totally the wrong product!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I’d waited quite a wile for my new running shoes. The ones that arrived were totally white instead of blue, size 3 instead of 7.5 and Adidas instead of Brooks. I couldn’t have been more disappointed!!
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Comfy and reliable running shoe (road and trail)
customer_reviews.text: Fabulous running show, comfortable and light. Worth the money and better than other brands I have tried
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect fit great comfort and great for running or all day wear
customer_reviews.text: Bought for my husband who constantly wears brooks trainers. The adrenaline is a favourite and fits like a glove for all day comfort and also 15 mile runs
customer_reviews.author: Rachel crilly

customer_reviews.title: nice and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: nice comfortable running shoes, i had the gts19 before and the gts20 does the job well.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Cracking shoe !
customer_reviews.text: Traded in my 2018 model for this year's. Even more comfortable. Would recommend.
customer_reviews.author: John C M Hall

customer_reviews.title: Previously had a pair of Brooks Men's Adrenaline Gts 19 and these seem to be just as good
customer_reviews.text: loved my pair of Brooks Men's Adrenaline Gts 19 so getting the 20 as my next running shoe was an easy choice.
customer_reviews.author: MR M A WILLIAMS

customer_reviews.title: So comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Like running on air. Can’t wait to run every day in these
customer_reviews.author: Leonardo Costa

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: The quality of the product what you would expect from Brooks
customer_reviews.author: martin waldron

customer_reviews.title: Fit as expected, a few glue drops on the seams...noticeable on the Black
customer_reviews.text: Fit as expected, a few glue drops on the seams...noticeable on the Black
customer_reviews.author: Davey H.

customer_reviews.title: The Range Rover of running shoe
customer_reviews.text: Been an Asics man all of my life...deviated to Nike on occasion but came straight back...after suffering a double stress fracture this year thought I would spend a bit more on some runners. Day 1 10 miles of running on cloud, Day 2 5 miles the same....I am 17.5 stone at the moment and can honestly say these are the most supportive, comfortable trainers I have ever had. some reviews say get half a size up..do it if you like a little space.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Smith

customer_reviews.title: Best running shoes for my personal needs
customer_reviews.text: Brooks is a guarantee when looking for a reliable and high performance running shoe. I had a pair of gts 15 that I destroyed, it was just natural to step on the upgraded version. Love the clean look, love the stability, the cushioning and the response it gives to every step. Adrenaline is perfect fot my pronation and my knees problem. It would be better to try these types of shoes, but in general you should buy 1/2 size bigger than your usual.
customer_reviews.author: Rikky

customer_reviews.title: Amazon please check the size before dispatching.
customer_reviews.text: Was looking forward for this shoes as they are very comfortable and fits to my running style . unfortunately Wrong size send By amazon Which is really unfortunate after you wait for any package with the price you pay. Luckily size fits ok thinking it will expand slightly after few runs as i ordered uk 10 received uk9.5. So kept it to save hassle. I was been offered a tiny bit compensation for the wrong item delivery. Hope it delivers the results as advertised.
customer_reviews.author: j

customer_reviews.title: Great stability shoe
customer_reviews.text: I have used the gts from version 13 and always loved them , the design change quite a bit in the 20 but works great , got 900 km out of the first gts20 and didn't hesitate to order my second pair
customer_reviews.author: David Dowling

customer_reviews.title: Wrong description
customer_reviews.text: Shoe description all wrong says UK 10 but shoe is actually UK size 9. Amazon should check before shipping
customer_reviews.author: Ali

customer_reviews.title: Excellent road running trainers.
customer_reviews.text: Ran 15 miles so far and loving the trainers. Nice design (neon rim) and excellent cushioning. Mostly used on road/pavement running.
customer_reviews.author: MR V.

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with these shoes and the punctual delivery.
customer_reviews.author: T S.

customer_reviews.title: Good support
customer_reviews.text: Comfortable and sturdy, providing good support without too much weight. I also have a pair of Brooks Levitate 3, and a pair of Brooks Glycerin 16. Noticed my ankles/shins are less likely to be sore after a long run if I have worn the Adrenaline Gts 20s. Bought them to train for/run the Southampton Marathon on 26 April, but C19 scuppered that! Wore them at the Farnborough half in January and Wokingham half in February and they performed well.
customer_reviews.author: Cowardly Lion

customer_reviews.title: Caused bad knee pain
customer_reviews.text: I started running on these shoes but kept getting knee pain. I’d only just begun running so assumed it was me, so I gave up on running and have had no knee pain since. But yesterday I just happened to put them on as normal shoes and today couldn’t understand why my knees were so painful when I got out of bed, I could hardly walk. Then it dawned on me tonight that it must be the shoes that are causing the problem. I’ve never had this with any other shoe, so it’s a strange one. Maybe it’s just bad luck.
customer_reviews.author: StevieP

product_meta.title: Brooks Adrenaline Gts 20, Men’s Running Shoe, Black/Lime/Blue Grass, 2.5 UK (35 EU)
product_meta.description: Fortarun shoes Technical model inspired shoes with integrated toe protection. These baby shoes are born for young champions. Inspired by the design of the technical models, they feature a breathable mesh upper and a midsole that offers cushioning and lightness. The tip with protection ensures durability.
